replies.replyComment: @Paththare ithin me aetgthama kathawa mama aeda mage puthata udau karapu kurunegalata  thriwil  riyaduru mahathatath kolaba thrikunamalaya bas kondosthara  mahathatath bohoma  pin meka awasthawak kara gannawa mage  daruwata pihita unata  aethatama deviwaru  wage ayath thama innawa
@Paththare kohomahari ae malli the bobna kadayak laga bas aeka nathara karpuwama mage puthata kannath athata salli dila
@Paththare den puthawa bas aekata naggala ara wisihatama kondosthara mallita kiyala passe manath ae mallita call aekak aran kiuwa ane malli mage puthawa bahina thenata salli aran aennam kiyala
@Paththare ae welawa mata denune ae kenath godak manussa kamin purunu thriwel driviar kenek kiyala
@Paththare mama kiuwa phone  aeka ae mamata denna mata kathakaranna kiyala passe ae kena kiuwa thrinko bas aekata kiyala mama puthawa aewannam oyala bahina thenata aewith salli denna kiyala
@Paththare hebei siiduwe voliball  sellam karanawa kiuwama kiyala putha  bayawenna aepa kiyala
@Paththare weel aeke  kena puthagen wisthara ahala meya un dewal kiyala
@Paththare mama aeyata mage baya denenna thibbe ne
@Paththare thrikunamalaya bas nathara karana thena den putha  hodatama baya wela
@Paththare den bas holt aeka kaga ae wenakota aekama aeka thriwil aekak thibila re 12 athakota welawa
@Paththare putha laga rupiyal 1000 i thibune kohomahari palathuru aran magata holt aeka lagata aenakota ithuru salli wetila
@Paththare kurunegalata  aewith behela mata kathakara amma aeka kadayak aerala thiyanawa nangita aeppel dodam aragannam kiuwa
@Paththare mokada aekak re nisa saha  puthage palaweni dura  thaniyama aena gamana nisa
@Paththare kurunegalata re 11wage mathaka hetiyata awe aena gaman mata meseg danawa mamath puthata kiuwe nethi unata harima bayen hitiye
@Paththare mama kiuwa putha  den aenna aepa heta pandarinma aenna kiyalath dawas 3 ine amme adama awoth kiyala mage  putha  gamana awa
@Paththare ae hawasa petris iwara wela migamuwata aenakota hawasa 7 i welawa
@Paththare dina 3 ka niwaduwakata gedara yanna dila krida sir mage putha  palaweni wathawata thamai duraka idala thaniyama bas aekaka aenne
@Paththare api kanthale.mage putha  ae wenakota siduuwe DAVI  samara pasele yanne voliball  walata daksa nisa
@Paththare 2017 wasaredi me siddiya mage wayasa 17 k wana deweni puthata un siddiyak me
